name: Smash Trump PRO
description:
THE MOST FUNNY OFFLINE CHEAP APP TO TAP AND SMASH TRUMP,RIVALS,POLITICIANS,FAMOUS PEOPLE

Download Smash Trump for cheap and play with it!!!

Venture in fun different worlds (not only in USA) when the president Donald Trump and his rivals, VIPs and politicians, always fashion dressed, will appear on your smartphone ready to be smashed.

Tap and Smash as much as you can until the time is over and reach the goal for the next level.
Many levels with different settings where you must smash Trump, compose puzzles, collect bonus but also avoid (don't tap) his rivals that could be famous people, ex-presidents, politicians, and more!!

A super entertaining funny game, for men and women, young and old!!

Download it, you won't change your mind!!!

- Funny voices of famous people involved in the game
- Very CHEAP
- Many levels with different settings
- Play without any wifi connection (offline game)
- No Facebook or email login required
- Three different languages available (english, spanish, italian)

Game guide: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B-H-6_4oUzamYWxCRnQ4eXVHS28

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SMASH-TRUMP-1490668484280034/

Disclaimer: "Smash Trump PRO" is a totally ironic and satirical app/game. We respect all involved celebrities. It doesn't transmit any political idea and it doesn't suggest anything about political ideology, votes or elections. This is only a funny game to play with!!!
